system_prompt_prefix: You have access to GitHub operations through the CRA system. Always use the CARP-resolved permissions when interacting with GitHub.

tools.name: github_create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository. Use this to report bugs, request features, or track tasks.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository (username or organization)

title.description: The title of the issue (keep concise, under 60 characters)

body.description: The contents of the issue in markdown format

tools.name: github_close_issue
tools.description: Close an existing GitHub issue. Use when an issue is resolved or no longer relevant.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository

comment.description: Optional closing comment explaining the resolution

tools.name: github_create_pull_request
tools.description: Create a new pull request to propose code changes for review and merging.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository

title.description: The title of the pull request

body.description: The description of the pull request in markdown

base.description: The branch to merge into (usually 'main' or 'master')

draft.description: Create as a draft PR if true
